fpmExplorer:Page.title: Micro Chart Dynamic Size
fpmExplorer:Page.introduction: The MicroChart building block enables you to render micro charts in different sizes.

fpmExplorer:ImplementationStep.text: To define the size of the micro chart, you can use the 'size' property of the micro chart building block. Valid sizes are 'XS', 'S', 'M', and 'L'.
